title_short: (46184) San Antonio de Benagéber - 7 Calle de la Purísima

description: Residential area facing the forest between Eliana and Canada. For van or van. No prohibition. Close to the metro. Be careful, it is residential, so be discreet.

title_short: (46184) Sant Antoni de Benaixeve - 121 Plaça Poligono 3

description: Gas station with water and toilets. Great place to park with security cameras and light

title: (46185) La Pobla de Vallbona - 4 Travesía Cementerio
title_short: (46185) La Pobla de Vallbona - 4 Travesía Cementerio
description: Large flat tarmac carpark on the edge of the village. Well lit and with security cameras. New public toilet facilities (not 24hr). Picnic benches and BBQ facilities with water and sinks. A few drinking fountains nearby but probably couldn't use them to fill up. Supermarket and Bar within 100m. Cycle paths alongside to take you into town centre with plenty more shops and restaurants.

title: (46190) Riba-roja de Túria -
description: Area of Riba-roja de Túria. Next to the river and under the bridge. Little conditioned but spacious and comfortable. Without services, even if they are going to put water. There is always a camper, at least. Toilet service neat little.

title: (46184) Sant Antoni de Benaixeve - 11 Carrer Gafarró
title_short: (46184) Sant Antoni de Benaixeve - 11 Carrer Gafarró
description: Good parking spot. unpaved under the trees. Good quiet location.

title: (46185) La Pobla de Vallbona - 3 Calle N 7 Osito II
title_short: (46185) La Pobla de Vallbona - 3 Calle N 7 Osito II
description: Parking for vehicles. At night quiet area. It has a children's area and picnic tables

title_short: (46190) Ribarroja de Turia - 116 Carretera de Vilamarxant
description: Laundry, 14kg at 4 euros, 19kg at 6 euros and dryers 17 kg at 2 euros, the washing machines put the soap and softener on them.

title: (46180) Benaguacil - 6 Calle Paterna
description: Parking 50 meters from the subway to Valencia with links to the airport of Valencia (Manises), around is a Mercadona, gas stations, workshops especially one dedicated to the repair of motorhomes, pet shop

title: (46117) Bétera - 16B Carrer Mosén Vicent Roig
description: It is a park where you can stop to eat as there are tables available for it, next door there is a Mercadona supermarket where you can load the van or motorhome with food and bottles of drinking water. There used to be public toilets in the park but they were closed and they were forbidden to enter the toilets. On the sides of the park there are areas of land where you can park. It's pretty quiet.

title: (46117) Bétera - 20 Plaça Camp de Túria
description: Dirt parking where you can spend the night without problem. The town is good to eat and follow the route.

title: (46117) Bétera - 267 Plaça Poligono N-77.R
description: 24-hour gas station, with pressure washing without a roof for trucks and motorhomes. Next to the vacuum cleaners there is a free water tap. Workshop they fix punctures at the moment.

title: (46940) La Presa - 12 Partida la Presa
description: Very quiet place to spend a night near the A-7. In front there is a small abandoned church. Near the railway line and the airport. You can hear an airplane passing by, although at night for traffic. Highly recommended.

title: (46940) La Presa - 105 Carrer del Lliri
description: Nice and calm place near a river. with a kids playground and a park. in the morning people walk or drive by.

title: (46117) Bétera - 36 Albereda Escultor Ramon Inglés
description:
Large parking lot in the small village Betera. The terminus of the yellow metro line is in just a few minutes walking distance. There are 2 super markets closeby. With all the comments of broken windows and strange things happening in the area around Valencia we decided to seek a less popular place.
This place is nothing special or beautifull, but nice to visit Valencia for a day or two. Also, the parking lots are not really suitable for motorhomes larger than 6 meters.
Heading eastwards outside the village is a popular and beautifull cycling track.

title: (46185) La Pobla de Vallbona - 3 Plaça Poligono N-05.R
title_short: (46185) La Pobla de Vallbona - 3 Plaça Poligono N-05.R
description: Quiet place with shade

title: (46190) Ribarroja de Turia - 6 Polígono Diseminados
description: Clean and quiet place for spend the night. Near the Airport and town.

title: (46182) La Canyada - 168A Carrer 15
description: We spent a quiet night in this parking lot in a residential area. No service for motorhomes but the parking lot is big enough even for a large motorhome.

title: (46980) Paterna - 26 Carrer de Leonardo da Vinci
title_short: (46980) Paterna - 26 Carrer de Leonardo da Vinci
description: We pulled off the freeway for a quick place to stay and discovered these parking lots in an industrial park. The Autobahn is really close, so it's relatively noisy. But we felt very safe and were able to continue the next Monday without any detours.

name: Valencia Camper Park
title: (46117) Valencia Camper Park
description:
Valencia Camper Park offers Camping services at Camper Park prices, plus we have direct Metro connection to the city centre in 25 minutes!

All services and amenities: Toilets and showers with hot water without coins, grey and black water emptying, free WiFi, sinks, washing machines and dryer, children's swings, outdoor gym, swimming pool in wide summer season, tourist information, sale of Metro tickets, Valencia Tourist Cards and tickets to the Oceanográfico!

Our bar-restaurant offers delicious homemade food, paellas, tapas, barbecues, a mini-market of basic products, fresh bread every morning...

If you come to Valencia with a motorhome, caravan, camper van or tent, Valencia Camper Park is the best option. 

For more information: ValenciaCamperPark.com/en

title: (46160) Llíria - 40 Calle Ue Sector ST-1
description: Parking next to LIDL

title: (46160) Liria - Vias Verdes de LLiria
description: Llirea cemetery.  ideal overnight spot. Very easy access, large flat tarmac parking alongside a bike path. Good access into the town to explore this ancient roman town.

title: (46160) Liria - 80 Calle de Juan Izquierdo
description: Very large public parking. Open all day. Within the population.

title: (46191) Vilamarxant - Carrer Don Alonso Latorre
description: Quiet place to sleep on weekdays. Without services. Trucks are also parked here. Near the river route of the river Turia, ideal for cycling.

title: (46185) La Pobla de Vallbona - 1A Carrer N1 Torre Porta Coeli
title_short: (46185) La Pobla de Vallbona - 1A Carrer N1 Torre Porta Coeli
description: Free outdoor parking. Municipal natural park It has covered and uncovered areas with tables and chairs to eat (picnic). Swings (and baby swings) and playground. Near marked path of small route. Adapted bathrooms (locked).

title: (46160) Liria - 15B Calle Proyecto N 9
description: Very easy free parking. Upper part paved and only for max. 6m vehicles. Lower part gravel, but more space. Ideal location for the Perfect wash laundromat.

title: (46160) Llíria - 15 Carrer de Gerardo Ferrando
description:
Self-service laundry. 20/30/40° laundry can be washed in 2x 12kg, 2x 16kg and a 21kg machine.
To dry it has 2x15kg and 1x 18kg.
It can only be paid in cash! A coin mechanism is available (5/10/20 tickets).

title: (46980) -
description: Anyone who finds the entrance (behind the Chinese shop) can stand here in the empty parking lot.

title: (46988) Paterna - 65 Carrer del Corretger
description: Drinking water source at one of the entrances to the Tactical park. Easy access with the camper or motorhome, you have to go up the sidewalk and bring the vehicle as close as possible to the tree behind the fountain to counteract the steep slope of the ground. It is not threaded and has a push button.

title: (46940) Manises - 31 Polígon el Comptat 3
description: Right behind Valencia Airport. Plenty of parking space. Up to truck size. Intermittent noise from take-off and landing aircraft. But is limited. Otherwise very calm.

title: (46940) Manises - 8 Carrer dels Esports
description: Parking in front of a stadium and in front of the buildings. The stadium has a nice cafe and a very clean toilet. I think for a quiet night, or when you have to go to the airport which is a few minutes away. For the airport car parks, there must be, according to the information I had, the P3 car park, P4 car park, and P6 car park, accessible to the motorhomes.

title: (46980) Paterna - 27 Carrer de les Roses
description: Small public parking; there is usually room at night. Right in front of the National Police station. They let you spend the night, several of the policemen there are users of motorhomes and campers. It has some slant. Only Campers fit, but motorhome can be parked nearby. There are no services.

title: (46988) Paterna - 2P Carrer del Corretger
description: Wide street cut off only by freight trucks from the nearby Carrefour. A lot of space to park and very spacious, next to the large Táctica park, ideal for a good walk with children and pets. Super quiet and next to a low cost gas station and a Burger King. Near an industrial estate on the outskirts of Paterna. 10 'from Valencia. Leaving the street towards the gas station, on the left there is a fountain easily accessible with the camper or motorhome.

title: (46988) Paterna - 2P Carrer de l'Algepser
description: At the Paterna gas station you can fill up water for 5 minutes for 1 euro. Attention water not drinkable but very useful if it is just for showers.

title: (46117) Serra - CV-331
description: Porta coeli picnic area with camping area. in low season and on weekdays it is usually not crowded. there are picnic areas and paelleros for cooking, as well as Turkish toilets. The weekend is different, it is an area of cycle paths and hikers. Although at night there is no problem, the area is very quiet

title: (46940) Manises - 16 Carrer Molí de la Llum
title_short: (46940) Manises - 16 Carrer Molí de la Llum
description: Automatic laundromats

title: (46980) Paterna - 43 Carrer Melissa
description: Parking day and night in Valterna area, there are several parking lots in this area, there are always several motorhomes parked. at night it is very quiet and if you arrive well on time there is always room, a little tilted if parked at the end.

title: (46160) Liria - CV-25
description: Parking area of the San Vicente Park in the town of Lliria (Valencia). Nice place to visit, with a large lake with many fish. Restaurant service, and several picnic areas.

title: (46160) Llíria - 3 CV-25
description: Parking area with some shade under the pines, next to San Vicente Park

title: (46980) Paterna - 37 Carrer Orenga
description: Laundry

title: (46940) Manises - 190 Plaça Num 7
description: New motorhome area in Manises. There are about 4 or 5 parking spaces. Draining of gray, black and filling with clean water. Recycling containers. The perfect place to get to know the city of ceramics, its gastronomy and a few meters from the Turia river park. Many thanks to the council for this installation.

title: (46940) Manises - 6 Carrer dels Sants Just i Pastor
title_short: (46940) Manises - 6 Carrer dels Sants Just i Pastor
description: Automatic laundry, not very good for parking

address.street: 6 Carrer dels Sants Just i Pastor

title: (46119) Nàquera -
description:
We live here in a community in mobile homes. The house is a shared house. The property serves as a base and retreat. From this place people travel and explore the world.

We are happy to offer you our open space for parking.

You can also use the kitchen and bathroom/toilet of the community here. Everyone knows that gas bottles, toilet paper and soap also cost money (donations are welcome if you use them). water is free Some drink it, some don't (unchlorinated/reservoir; officially not drinking water).

We are looking forward to your visit. Please come right over. Registration is not required. There is always space when you need a place to sleep.

We don't offer animation, we live here. There is no program. Joint events happen randomly.
Our electricity is solar-dependent, so it is also possible to supply externally.
So no 5* with full board should be expected. Thanks.

Please use the park4night functions to make contact. The rating portal is of course NOT intended for communication.
I'm sorry I have to write everything. Unfortunately, from experience, it is unfortunately necessary.


Thank you, we look forward to seeing you!

title: (46394) Ribarroja de Turia - 17 Calle M
description: Large, free, public car park in the industrial area. At a gas station nearby you can also take a shower for a fee.

title: (46394) Ribarroja de Turia - 2 Calle Oliveral-Q
description: Ample dirt parking, industrial zone, but very quiet

title: (46160) Liria - 68 Urbanización Edeta
description: Quiet place near the city. The gravel road is easy to drive on. The Sant Vincent Park is very close and great for walks or bike tours.

title: (46940) Manises - 6 Calle Vicente Calatrava
description: Near the Valencia metro "Rosas", near the pedestrian crossing to the airport, 5 'walk. Commercial area with supermarket, restaurants and bars. lots of cars and roadside ... not comfortable to sleep.

title: (46940) Manises - 104 Plaça Num 7
description: Parking at the edge of a very uncrowded street, in the middle of a sports center. we spent one night before going to the airport, 5 minutes by camper.

name: Casa CariSan
title: (46191) Casa CariSan
description: Parking space in the middle of nature with many orange trees. Chickens and cats roam freely on the premises. The pool can be shared.

title: (46117) Serra - 5 CV-331
description: By the side of the road. It is an area where several vehicles can park. It has tables and benches to sit. There is a barbecue area, it is a hiking and cycling area on the road that is attached.

title: (46989) Paterna - 27B Carrer Carlina
description: Level land area, if it rains some puddles form. Quiet place in a residential area. Supermarket very close.

title: (46394) Ribarroja de Turia - 13 Carrer I
description: We searched a lot and it is the only gas station we found that had showers. They are 3 euros, they give you the keys and it is a single shower bathroom away from the gas station. It is quite clean.

title: (46191) Vilamarxant - 35 Plaça Diseminados
description: Large parking in recreational area. Quiet and beautiful place in nature to spend the day and night. Area with barbecue, bar, garbage containers and drinking water.

title: (46940) Manises - 8 Carrer de Sedavi
description: Area near the airport, in a polygon of Manises, you can rest and you have the Madrid road close by

title: (46117) Serra - CV-331
description: Nice parking space with numerous cycling and walking routes. Good alternative to the busy car park a little further. Spent 2 nights hassle free!

title: (46940) Manises - 20 Calle Montepio
description: This place is on the side of a police station and 5 minutes from metro station Manises. Considering the huge numbers of thefts in Valência, this place is the only safe option to visit the city. Stayed for 2 nights and went to Valência by day with no problem. It is not a pretty place, but does the job.

title: (46100) Burjassot - 143C Carretera de Llíria
description: Safe, illuminated, level and quiet site. There's no noise.

title: (46100) Burjassot - 25 Carrer de Sant Miquel
description: Parking for long time

title: (46930) Quart de Poblet - 8 Carrer Pessebret
description: Parking of the Bonaire shopping center. You can park and use restrooms. Very nice people. Restaurants, leisure area, shopping center... in the center's dependency it has bathrooms, unlimited Wi-Fi, power outlets, all free. Sunday service does not work.

title: () Urbanització les Mallaes -
description: Beautifully hidden picnic spot with a river running all around; plenty of people swimming and having a picnic. Benches, kids playground, great for dogs; also shade in some areas from trees. Note: it’s the other side of the river to another spot that was listed, where there’s only a car park, no shade and a few mins walk to the river. So we drove round (10 mins) and found this, much better suited. Doesn’t say you can’t park, so we have! Nobody else here this evening. Not too busy during today (Sat) maybe it’s more of a local place. You have to come down the ‘no entry’ the last 100m to arrive, there is no other way. No traffic noise whatsoever as you are far enough from a main road.

title: (46960) Aldaia - C. Centro Comercial Bonaire
description: We spent the night parked at the bottom of the parking lot. Tranquility 7 am workers begin to come shopping center. Ideal to stock up and eat and continue the route.

title: (46112) Massarrojos - 4 Camí Fondo de Borbotó
description: Parking metrovalencia station. We have left the motorhome here for the two days of visiting Valencia with their respective nights and without problem. In the city we read that there was a lot of theft problem and we fled looking for tranquility because all the areas are full.

title: (46035) València - 21 Calle Barranco
description: Free parking 24h. Guarded with city hall cameras.

title: (46370) Chiva - 245 Plaça Numero 17
description: Repsol gas station with water and air machine. Right next to it there is a parking for cars and exchange is and a restaurant open 24 hours

title: (46191) Vilamarxant - 148 Plaça Diseminados
description: Level and fairly large municipal dirt car park. There is no sign prohibiting motorhomes, although the access road is narrow and unpaved. It is a car park set up for the La Pea bathing area. I spent the night without noise and very quiet, on weekends I suppose it will be more crowded

title: (46930) Quart de Poblet - 78 Avinguda Reial Monestir Santa Mar
title_short: (46930) Quart de Poblet - 78 Avinguda Reial Monestir Santa Mar
description: Free municipal parking

title: (46100) Burjasot - 15 Avinguda dels Esports
description: Parking next to the gym, you are a little less central than the parking of palm trees but it is true that it is also more saturated, there is noise of the subway passing by and from a road but in our case this was not embarrassing, we came here sent by the local Police

title: (46035) Valencia - 12 Plaza Camporrobles
description: Gravel ground without installation. Ideal for the day. Not tested at night. Metro 5 min walk. Near the highway. Free!

title: (46960) Aldaya - 7 Calle de Don Juan de Austria
title_short: (46960) Aldaya - 7 Calle de Don Juan de Austria
description: It has taken a lot of work and effort, but we can already say that it is open! We are at your disposal, in case there are vehicles from Valencia in the group, it may be of interest to you. Covered Parking of new creation. In closed ship, with video surveillance, concrete floor.  Motorhomes, Quad, Comanche, etc. With good access and close to V-30, A-3, A-7, near the airport, 7 km from Valencia, with a bus stop and next to CC Bonaire. The services to be offered: Emptying gray and black water Video surveillance and alarm connected to the alarm center Air compressor Drinking water Safe Light Automatic door Fire fighting system Single entry for customers. Toilets 24 hour service. Prices depend on the measurements of the vehicle.

address.street: 7 Calle de Don Juan de Austria

title: (46119) Náquera - 172G Partida Forqueta
description:
Hello traveler!!
If you need to rest for a few days we will be happy to receive you.
At the moment we do not have trees for shade.
Little by little we are creating a project.
But you can always take a dip in the pool.
Look at the last photo and follow the arrow for the location.
There is an open parking lot down the road.
We speak Spanish, German and English.
Many services around, mountain routes, nearby supermarket, pharmacy, parks for children...
Totally free, donations are accepted to improve the project.
We will wait for you!!

title: (46930) Cuart de Poblet - 17 Plaza Cortes Valencianas
title_short: (46930) Cuart de Poblet - 17 Plaza Cortes Valencianas
description: Plenty of plane during the day, less at night. Right next to a perfect skate park, better than those in Barcelona for connoisseurs. No water nearby.

title: (46960) Aldaya - 66 Polígono Número 24
description: Plot of land, there are always cars, trucks and some motorhome parked.

title: (46370) -
description: Perfect parking day and night, next to the gas station, with services, bar.

title: (46119) Nàquera - 50 Carrer Valencia
description: Public fountain

title: (46116) Montcada - 9 Partida de la Contienda
description:
Section of road cut, in a roundabout, about 25 meters long by 7 meters wide. With Camper L1 it turns around well, for longer vehicles it can get complicated.
Without shadow.
To spend a lucky night.
The Civil Guard arrived, checked documentation and said good night to me.
Vehicle noise from the AP7.

title: (46119) Náquera - 29A Calle San Francisco
description: Clearing suitable for parking and overnight. Very quiet place, we have been a couple of days without any problem. It is practically flat. Next to it there is a garbage can and a fountain. Good views of Valencia

title: (46035) València - 44 Carrer de Favanella
description: A super quiet place with plenty of parking on the outskirts of Valencia to spend a night, bus 62 takes you to the center, stop 100 meters away.

title: (46035) València - 5 Carrer Preseguer
description: A place to spend a night, close to the road but next to a pretty town. After 11 p.m. it is quieter. You can park all day, no problem. It is two minutes by bus and arrival in Valencia. perfect for misses. leave parked and come back. I've been here for three days and no problems

title: (46920) Valencia - 8A Sc Quint II
description: Large parking area. Next to a funeral home but no problem, just people walking dogs and the noise of planes landing but very acceptable. Great to visit Valencia by bike, 5 minutes from the head of the Turia park. Supermarkets nearby, all quiet

title: (46920) Valencia - 1P Sc Quint II
description: Very large parking lots. They are usually calm. Nearby to access by bike or walking to the old riverbed of Valencia.

title: (46920) Mislata - 2P Sc Quint II
description: Tarmac parking without services where you can spend the day and night in peace. The local police do their rounds during the day. 15 mins walk from the friendly town center and 6 km from Valence.

title: (46015) València - 35 Calle a Pp Sector 1 Ademuz Pg
title_short: (46015) València - 35 Calle a Pp Sector 1 Ademuz Pg
description: Calle Els Ports that surrounds the back of the Palacio de Congresos, in one of the most modern areas of Valencia. There is usually a place to park during the day (if there is no event at the Palace) if not, it is emptier at night. Street surrounded by parks and in one of them there is a source of drinking water. There are also recycling bins. In the same roundabout you have a huge Repsol station for LPG refilling, washing, shop ... Supermarkets, on-call pharmacies, bars, chic restaurants, ATMs, bazaars, Media Markt, taxi rank, a hospital and even a church within walking distance. stone throw. Empalme tram stop nearby and on the same avenue Cortes Valencianas, Beniferri metro stop and bus 62 that leaves you in the center. Better connection impossible. Stay overnight without problem. At night it is very quiet.

address.street: 35 Calle a Pp Sector 1 Ademuz Pg

title: (46970) Alaquàs - 95 Carretera Pla de Quart
description: Self-service laundry, gas station and plenty of parking.

title: (46920) Valencia - 1A Sc Quint II
description:
A huge asphalt parking lot with fencing, barriers and security cameras. parking is free and the barriers open as you approach them. 2.5m height restriction. The police academy is next to it and presume the students park here so must be safe. No bays for motorhomes but no prohibition sign either and plenty of space.
A short pleasant walk through top of park to get to the zoo.

title: (46920) Mislata - 32 Carrer Sèquia de Favara
description: A quiet street for a city visit and a night. Best during the holidays and festivals.

title: (46970) Alaquàs - 35 Carrer Sant Joan de Ribera
title_short: (46970) Alaquàs - 35 Carrer Sant Joan de Ribera
description: Parking

title: (46035) València - 25 Carrer de la Vall d'Aiora
title_short: (46035) València - 25 Carrer de la Vall d'Aiora
description: It is a dirt parking lot there are gorillas but they help you to park there is no service but it is 5 minutes from the center

title: (46960) Aldaia - 58 Plaça Numero 14
description: Gas station with the possibility of washing your motorhome. It does not have a balcony to clean the roof but the man from the gas station has left me a ladder and I have been able to wash it from above. Also, if you are accompanied, you can use the 2 hoses/guns that are on the sides simultaneously. The price of diesel is very good too. Saturday night and Sunday night does not close at night. The other days at 9:30 they remove the hoses.

title: (46119) Nàquera - 294 Plaça Poligono 8
description: A very quiet and cool place where you can spend a few days quietly, with good views, where the dogs can run freely without any danger. Away from roads. Access for any vehicle, clean air services.

title: (46163) Marines -
description: Very large parking behind the cemetery of this small village,  about 2km to small shops and bars.  very easy access for any size camper. because its a cemetery, I'd suggest overnight only but my guess is its only used a couple times a month at most.

title: (46015) València - 6D Partida Arriba
description: Drinking water source in the Valencian garden, among farmers' houses. Good pressure, it is not threaded and has a push button. Easy access with the Ac or camper and enough space to momentarily park it upside down or backside and fill the tank with a hose.

title: (46920) Mislata - 20 Calle Braç dels Horts
description: Municipal space for parking. Gravel and dust. Mislata is a very densely populated town. Difficult access with a long motorhome.

title: (46970) Alaquàs - 2 Avinguda General Palafox
description: A parking lot in Alaquás park There is space for a grill

title: (46035) València - 506 Avinguda de Pío Baroja
description: Small parking in earth at 30 minutes from the old town, by bike. Easy access even with a big motorhome. Right in front of the Suma gas station.

title: (46035) València - 82 Avinguda Pío Baroja
description: Free parking spaces ideal for visiting Bioparc. The local police are 20 meters away so you feel safe. There is a shopping center 200 meters away which is also very convenient. Ideal for campervans

title: (46920) Mislata - 4C Carrer d' Almenars
description: Parking just behind the BIOPARC (7 minutes walk from this place to the door of the Bioparc), it is a gravel lot in the middle of buildings, a place that the neighbors use to park, it is spacious and has an infinite number of bars and restaurants around it, 1 minute walk there is a sports center where there are many trees (on weekends many people go to eat outdoors) and a park for children, next to the sports center is the Mislata health center that also has a large parking lot and also there is an indoor pool.

title: (46970) Alaquàs - s/n Carrer Pablo Iglesias
description: New parking, only for not very large vans, that are not more than 210 meters high. Close to supermarket and garden area with picnic tables. Very quiet. The town has a beautiful 16th century castle that can be visited. Good combination of metro bus to reach the center of Valencia in 10 minutes. There are no services.

title: (46950) Xirivella - 17 Calle Sector Sgzv-pg 6
description: Parking area next to the Teaching Institute. Near train stop that takes you to the center of Valencia. Supermarkets nearby.

title: (46035) Valencia - 28 Calle del Maestro Bagant
description: Parking in the urban area. Close to Bioparc and Parque de Cabecera. Near Hipercor and Carrefour. Attention Valencia City Council has issued a decree that prohibits all vehicles of the inhabitable type from parking in the city, under penalty of being verbalized.

title: (46169) Olocau - 6 Calle de San José
description: Parking can accommodate five to six camper municipal parking to visit the small village of Olocau

title: (46950) Chirivella - 69 Avenida de la Constitució
description: Wide open field with constantly parked cars. To spend a night it is fine and quiet

title: (46900) Torrent - 47F CV-4115
description: Parking with shade, quiet and with a source of drinking water. This source is only for the inhabitants of the city.

title: (46015) Valencia -
description: Automatic laundry, small but just opened and is very clean. Two washing machines of 10 kg and a machine of 20 kg. Two dryers of 20 kg.

title: (46950) Chirivella - 1C Calle Veinticinco Abril
description: Small free parking right next to a mall, it has about 20 spaces, but there is usually room. There is a coin operated laundry right next door.

title: (46118) Serra - 28 Plaça Poligono 35
description: Fairly large public parking, although not all spaces are level. A 3 min walk there is a bakery. A good place to start many routes in the area, in the quietest part of town. Be careful with the Maps to get there as it takes you through a somewhat narrow street.

title: (46009) València - 50C Plaça Num 29
description: Free dirt city parking. we did not sleep there.

title: (46149) Gilet -
description: Attention !! This is a private location with limited space so YOU MUST CONTACT THE OWNERS PRIOR TO YOUR ARRIVAL!!! Organic avocado farm. At the moment there are no amenities or facilities, but the place is perfect to spend a couple of days exploring the area since it is very close to the Sierra Calderona natural park with all that that entails. a natural and quiet environment, to make a stop along the way (very close to the ap7) and take the opportunity to go on a hike or bike tour in the mountains, knowing that you leave the vehicle on private and guarded property, avoiding complaint problems of foresters or robberies. In addition, the owners offer seasonal products such as their spectacular organic avocados or vegetables. They intend to improve the possibilities of the place to offer better services in the future. the estate has guard dogs on the loose, so it is preferable to speak with the owners before releasing your pets. there is no fee, donations are accepted to improve the place, and it is supported with the purchase of direct products from the field. 20 min from the Puçol/Puig beach. It is a dirt truck about 800 meters, with low difficulty but preferable tall/off road vehicles. It is appreciated to communicate approximate arrival time to manage the stay and the attention to the guests in the best possible way, since we do not live here

title: (46019) València - 85 Camí de Montcada
description: Free water service

title: (46900) Torrent - 4-6 Travesía Rosendo Montoro
description: Leisure area, small tables ... With bathrooms and water. Ideal for eating. Playground for children. There is not much room for parking. Narrow streets.

title: (46009) València - 16 Calle Casas Barrington
description: Parking area in the city, quiet neighborhood, used by vans, but we are always exposed

title: (46019) València - 171A Plaça Num 23 Res Urb
description: Free parking Without services.

title: (46018) València - 56 Carrer de Josep Maestre
description: Large parking lot in the residential zone, it seems safe. There are lots of green areas, some with benches. near the local "mercado", subway 5 minutes walk, center of town 30 minutes walk. 14.12.21 the above is true, except for security: our mobile home was broken into in broad daylight.

title: (46019) València - 278 Avinguda de la Constitució
description: Free shaded parking in the morning. Drinking water fountain at the entrance of the car park. Quiet at night and with a bus stop right at the entrance of the car park that takes you to Valencia.

title: (46132) Almácera - 19 Calle Vial N5 -Sector 2
description: Truck parking with a small area of pines, hopefully you can have shade, near the Barcelona road and about ten minutes away there is a bus stop.

title: (46009) València - 1D Camí de Montcada
description: Parking lot close to the city center

title: (46136) Museros - 14 Calle Proy 005 Ns 81
description: Place to park day and night without being able to camp. Free quiet place. It's not special for motorhomes but it's a big enough car park, and it's 10 minutes from Pobla de Farnals beach, Alboraya etc.

title: (46014) València - 1B Carrer dels Traginers
description: Carwash place (self service with pressure lancet) including one place for larger vehicles like motorhome including a ladder to wash the vehicle from above. Price see pictures. There is also a water source for customers (low pressure, need syphon to fill canister, see also picture) and vacuum.

title: (46130) Massamagrell - 41 Avinguda de Blasco Ibañez
description: Water point, public service toilets

title: (46135) Albalat dels Sorells - 13 Carrer de Moncada
title_short: (46135) Albalat dels Sorells - 13 Carrer de Moncada
description: Public water tap located on the dog park. Possibility to park just at the fence.

title: (46900) Torrent - 5 Carrer Gaspar Navarro Piles
description: Laundromat, 2 machines, two dryers. WiFi zone. By cons try to park on the avenue because many cars parked in the street. Works with Euros. Possibility of changing tickets into coins. Located behind the National Polícia police station.

name: Nomadic Valencia Camping Car
title: (46135) Nomadic Valencia Camping Car
description:
Camper area of 33 plots, 8 km north of the wonderful city of Valencia.
We are the area camper you are looking for when you want to visit a big city.
Exclusive accommodation for motorhomes and campervans.


3 REASONS WHY TO STAY AT CAMPING NOMADIC:

1) Plots of 8 and 10m in length and 10 and 16 amps of electricity. Hot showers included in the overnight rate. Free emptying and filling of water for our customers.

2) Easy and fast connection with the city of VALÈNCIA:
 * BY SUBWAY: 20 MINUTES TO THE CENTER
 * BY BICYCLE 10KM TO THE HISTORIC CENTER by safe and flat bike path.
Closest beach 5.5 km. Easy connection to bike lane.

3) At 200m. The municipality of Albalat dels Sorells is located, with services accessible on foot: supermarket, bars and restaurants, gas stations, bank, etc.


WE HIGHLIGHT:

⭐⭐ Free information on routes to take with a touring bike or road bike.
⭐⭐ Touring and electric bikes for rent.
⭐⭐ Free WIFI SERVICE on all plots.
⭐⭐ Valencian rice service on request to taste on your plot. 
⭐⭐ Tourist information about the area and the city of Valencia. Buy the tourist card VT Card and tickets for the Oceanogràfic and the City of Arts and Sciences at reception.

address.street: 14 Carrer de Puig de Santa Maria

title: (46014) València - 11 Carrer del Ceramista Ros
description: Laundromat "Washlab"

title: (46019) Valencia - 2 Sector Tabernes Blanqu
description: Relaxed spot to spend a night near fields

title: (46118) Serra - 15 Plaça Poligono 4
description: Picnic area with spring / water

title: (46016) València - 32B Avinguda del Rei en Jaume
title_short: (46016) València - 32B Avinguda del Rei en Jaume
description: Large flat car park in front of the Lladro Museum.

title: (46003) València - 11 Carrer d'Alejandra Soler
description: Self-service laundry

title: (46900) Torrent - 4 Carrer de Fernando Furió Roca
title_short: (46900) Torrent - 4 Carrer de Fernando Furió Roca
description: Left the vehicle here to go to Valencia by metro. Everything went fine

title: (46540) El Puig de Santa Maria - Autopista del Mediterráneo
title_short: (46540) El Puig de Santa Maria - Autopista del Mediterráneo
description: 24h service station, very quiet place to rest and spend the night on the carpark of the petrol station.

title: (46019) València - 92 Plaça Num 81 Res Urb
description: Not the prettiest... but a useful spot for staying in València for a night or two. Approx a 20 minute walk to the North of the city centre. Dog park / area near by.

title: (46019) València - 84 Plaça Num 81 Res Urb
description: Not the prettiest, but a safe large parking lot to spend the night. We have been here for a longer period of time, other campers come and go. Many people with dogs during the day, a safe feeling to leave your vehicle unattended. Please note: the car park's driveway is via a pedestrian crossing on the side of the Supercor supermarket.

title: (46900) Torrent - 11 Calle Prolongación Carlet
description: It is a normal car park but we have been struck by the large number of playgrounds in the area. This town, Torrent, is marked as a town dedicated to childhood. It is full of parks, there are bars and restaurants with areas for children, they have circuses and fairs frequently because of what you see, etc. Ideal to stop or spend the night with children to take their breaks on long trips. We have been great

title: (46008) Valencia - 13 Gran Via de Ferran el Catòlic
title_short: (46008) Valencia - 13 Gran Via de Ferran el Catòlic
description: Day parking (7:00 a.m. - 11:00 p.m.) very close to the center of the city of Valencia and the entrance is 2.70 m high

address.street: 13 Gran Via de Ferran el Catòlic

title: (46164) Pedralba - 437A Plaça Diseminados
description: Ideal parking to spend one night, at the entrance of the town of Pedralba, quiet, spacious, with bins, there is a public scale for trucks. Ideal to know the weight of your van. In front there is a bar.

title: (46380) Cheste - 22 Carretera Cheste-Chiva
description: Parking sports complex good for spending a night or two. Pleasant, quiet village center nearby.

title: (46900) Torrent - 17 Carrer Toll-l'Alberca Calle B
description: Parking of a shopping center which houses a nightclub. The neighborhood has several places with parked truckers.

title: (46900) Torrent - 4 Calle Escultor Vicente Pallardo
description: Large parking lot may be noisy as close to busy roads. We stayed only for lunch but there is no ban on staying there at night.

title: (46014) València - 57 Carrer de Fontanars dels Alforins
title_short: (46014) València - 57 Carrer de Fontanars dels Alforins
description: Location next to a park in one of the least exploited tourist areas of Valencia. It is worth having lunch in the Plaza de Patraix.

title: (46136) Museros - 5 Carrer Francesc de Vinatea
description: Laundry at Repsol gas station. Easy parking for large vehicles. there is a possibility to fill up watter (no drinking water! 1€/5min)

title: (46120) Alboraia - 4 Partida Desemparats
description: Flat and quiet parking, no asphalt but very ok. After trying a few spots in the city we were happy to find this one. Other spots seemed a bit sketchy and were pretty loud, plus no possibility of leaving our cat outside. The parking is next to a metro line but it didn’t bother us. It is just two minutes walking to that same metro which takes you to Colon in Valencia in 7 minutes. Not a pretty spot or anything special but for us the best spot to visit the city and stay a night.

title: (46164) Pedralba - CV-380
description: Source of spring, untreated water that is rare around here. There are two half inch taps and the sign says "Fuenta de la canaleta. Spring water. untreated". you are going to need at least 10m hose to connect the tap to your van.

title: (46014) València - 661 Carrer de Vicent Clavel
description: Parking 40 minutes from city centre. Stay 2 nights without problem

title: (46001) València - 36 Avinguda de l'Oest
description: Parking garage suitable for vans. Height limit 2.2 m, wide parking bays up to 5.5 m in length possible. No overnight stay

title: (46900) Torrent - 30 Carrer Toll-l'Alberca Calle B
description: Quiet on street parking, just off motorway. Frequented by long distance lorry drivers for thier overnight stops. There is an Aldi, a fuel station and a McDonalds within 50mts. Fairly level so no need for ramps.

title: (46014) València - 2115 Carrer de Vicent Clavel
description: Big dusty free parking. Entrance is from the road with gas station. 40minutes to centre

title: (46014) València - 6 Carrer dels Campaners
description: Went to the climbing gym. There is free wifi with the code naturalclimbingvalencia and showers if you go climbing. There are a lot of parking spots around and if you are lucky to find one you are safe to spend the night. They said it is safe to stay here

title: (46014) València - 2122 Carrer de Vicent Clavel
description: Many streets have parking along the side. You need to have a little bit of luck to get a spot but it is free. Could be hard for big campervans though. Parked here to get to the climbing gym 200m away.

title: (46592) - 374 Diseminado Rodeno
description: Space for 2 cars in a bend. There are virtually no people and many more places to sleep. Incredible view over Valencia. No cars, no guardia civil. Good for hiking and mountain biking

title: (46592) - 354 Diseminado Rodeno
description: Quiet and nice view. Good for a walk! No toilet and water.

title: (46130) La Pobla de Farnals - 151 Avinguda Major
title_short: (46130) La Pobla de Farnals - 151 Avinguda Major
description: Laundry room and dryer in front of the Mercadona. Parking is limited on side streets. Otherwise, you can park in the Mercadona car park. The first hour is free.

title: (46010) València - 76 Avinguda del Primat Reig
description: Repsol service station, free water and toilets. It seems to be paid but water is free, air costs 1 euro.

title: (46017) València - 79 Plaça Num 141 Res Urb
description: Parking next to the very large cemetery but without services. A half hour walk from the city of sciences and the city center. In general quiet at night although there is a road next to which cars pass throughout the night.

title: (46210) Picanya - 36 Carrer Mariana Pineda
description: Casual parking in urban area VERY GREEN AREA, trees, lawn, ...... bike lane. Very quiet and SAFE semi-detached housing area. Large parking area and very empty of vehicles. Just behind it is a very large grocery store (open Monday to Saturday from 9:00 a.m. to 9:30 p.m.). There is a fountain in the grassy area, you can catch some water. You have a bike lane in front of you that connects the entire municipality, very fun ... route with a bicycle or scooter, RECOMMENDATION: Visit orchard houses (Calle Orihuela) ....... the town is small, about 11,000 inhabitants. You have the metro station at the end of the avenue. You go down the stairs and go under the bridge to access where you buy tickets. Very close to the motorway exit... put in GPS: Av Sanchis Guarner, behind the covered municipal swimming pool. You can enter in GPS: - Av Sanchís Guarner 28 (just behind the indoor pool) It is a beautiful area of a quiet town. In summer you can take the table and chairs out to the lawn for DINNER (The residents of the area usually do it, the Local Police allow it). Very very clean and very safe town. PLACES TO EAT/DINE: -Peanflo (Plaza Mayor) -La Seu (Picanya sports center, food only). -The Crank (Avenida l'Horta). *In summer I recommend having a horchata (a typical Valencian fresh drink, it is a very small horchateria, just a bar to serve) It is located in the Plaza del País Valenciano, near the Peanflo. **OPEN ONLY IN MAY- JUNE - JULY - AUGUST -SEPTEMBER

title: (46010) Valencia -
description: Free parking in the immediate vicinity of the city. Located in a beautiful park. On the central reservation big enough for mobile homes.

title: (46130) Massamagrell - 30b Avinguda del Mediterrani
description: Drinking water next to a roundabout

title: (46118) Serra, Valencia - Unnamed Road
description: Up the Hill end Road closed to the antennas a couple of non tilt areas, nothing social just views.

title: (46010) València - S/N Carrer de Montforte
description: Very silent place to rest

title: (46592) Segart - 54 Urbanización la Malla
description: Panoramic view toward mountains and ocean. located next to the road, but still very quiet. Paved roads, not hard to get here. Some houses around.

title: (46388) Godelleta - 3A Calle Lugo-calicanto B
description: Alameda esplanade. Land space next to the river. We spent the night in the middle of July alone. Not many mosquitoes. A bit of music noise, but it was Saturday.

title: (46014) Valencia - Unnamed road
description: Good starting point to visit Valencia. It is a parking and metro space. You can also stay overnight there. If noise disturbs your sleep, don't stay here.

title: (46132) Saboya - 58U Partida Barranc
description: Public plot located between the restaurants / bars La Lluna de Valencia and Les Tendes with views of the garden. The plot is dirt and level, parking is easy and we spent a very quiet night in the background, since it is usually full between 9:00 and 10:00 for lunch and about 9:00 p.m. for dinners (around 23:00 the parking lot was empty because restaurants were closed) PS: Les Tendes bar has very clean bathrooms, a good atmosphere and some great sandwiches and portions.

title: (46500) Albalat dels Tarongers - Partida Vall Calderona
title_short: (46500) Albalat dels Tarongers - Partida Vall Calderona
description: Take the track. Only for van / van which is not afraid. Preferably 4x4. Corner in the middle of nature. Many athletes but no discomfort. Leave clean.

title: (46010) València - 13 Passeig de l'Albereda
description: Shaded parking lanes and close to the police station, so feel safe. Recommended for smaller vehicles up to 6m. Good starting point to go into town. In the evening, however, rather loud.

title: (46006) Valencia - C. de les Filipines
description: Paid parking (blue limit) for a maximum of 2 hours. Ideal for a short city tour. I felt safe there without fear of the camper being broken into.

title: (46017) València - 25B Carrer del Litògraf Pascual i Abad
title_short: (46017) València - 25B Carrer del Litògraf Pascual i Abad
description: Public and free open space 24/7 close to restaurants, bars and supermarkets

address.street: 25B Carrer del Litògraf Pascual i Abad

title: (46592) Segart - 8 Urbanización la Malla
description: Great point of view on el Garbí. Space for a 6m flat camping car and others with calles. 5 minutes by car from the mirador. We did this in the low season.

title: (46010) València - 18 Passeig de l'Albereda
description: Central parking next to the mall. Eye, they steal a lot. Security increases as you get closer to the police station (away from the Zaragoza roundabout). Recommended to park in front of the police. Parking suitable for long vehicles.

title: (46164) Pedralba - 73 Calle Colón
description: Free parking great for spending a night. Quiet. Local police are tolerant. Water point 50 mtv. Supermarket 150 mt.

title: (46010) València - 4D Passeig de l'Albereda
description: Super near to the city centre. For free. Asked the police, van with 2.2m width is just ok. Length depends on the free space.

title: (46020) València - 8 Carrer de Daniel Balaciart
description: It's a normal street in a fairly quiet area, with no bars or clubs. The downside is that parking is not easy to find.

title: (46020) València - 39 Camí de Vera
description: Free parking, very quiet at night, 2 km 7 from the city center, cycle track, 5 to 6 minutes by bike.

title: (46010) València - 48 Avinguda de Blasco Ibáñez
description:
Parking near "mestalla" (Valencia F.C.'s stadium) Carefull on sundays, there is the valencia street market and parking is not allowed.
Also carefull if there is a Valencia F.C. match, it will be full and a lot of people near the stadium, normally this will happen on weekends but not all, also during summer there is no soccer season so it will be more free.
 It's surrounded by offices, so it's empty out of working hours. No amenities, just a quiet parking for cars.
supermarkets are near

title: (46200) Paiporta - 48G Carrer Marqués del Turia
description: Quiet area on the outskirts of Paiporta in public parking.

title: (46010) València - 4 Avinguda de Suècia
description:
Neighborhood laundry.
The detergent product is included.
Please bring cash.

title: (46017) Valencia - Calle Fernandez Mesa
description: Non-potable water source.

title: (46004) València - 39 Carrer de la Pianista Empar Iturbi
title_short: (46004) València - 39 Carrer de la Pianista Empar Iturbi
description: Parking that is good for vans and campers with heavy traffic, a little rough terrain, but a lively and safe place. nearby launderette, tapas bar, pharmacy. near the center

address.street: 39 Carrer de la Pianista Empar Iturbi

title: (46004) València - 60 Carrer de la Pianista Empar Iturbi
title_short: (46004) València - 60 Carrer de la Pianista Empar Iturbi
description: Laundromat available: 3 washing machines, 2 dryers. Works with 1euro coins, a money changer is available.

address.street: 60 Carrer de la Pianista Empar Iturbi

title: (46021) València - 38 Carrer de Rubén Darío
description: Free and safe daily parking, rather vans, on the afternoon in shade. 30 min walk from the ciudad de artes y ciencia

title: (46149) Gilet - 47 Plaça Poligono 1
description: Flat place in a quiet area.Ideal for hiking and to visit the monastery of Santo Espiritu.Quiet night.Casas nearby.

title: (46021) Valencia - 35 Carrer del Clariano
description: Attention Valencia City Council has issued a decree that prohibits all vehicles of the habitable type, to park in the city, under pain of being verbalized. Motorhomes are tolerated for a time limit not exceeding 24 hours.

title: (46021) València - 10 Avinguda d'Aragó
description: Free parking in the centre of Valencia (Be careful all the aisles of the car park are not free, do not park on the blue areas). We got there in the morning (many places were still available) and left at the end of the day without any problems (no tickets, no break-ins). Parking is accessible to all vehicles (car, van or van) but not to camper vans. Near the car park is a metro station (Aragon, line 5) as well as a city bike station.

title: (46590) Estivella - 38A Plaça Poligono 14
description: Closed to a hermit a not too watery fountain. hermit is closed to public, shadowy and not comfortable to stay.

title: (46163) Marines - 384 Diseminado P014
description: In the Sierra Calderona, area surrounded by nature. Very nice and quiet, near there is a road but with very little traffic. The city of Marines Viejo has some services and a source, but the indicated place has no services. Next door there is a purifier, but when we were there was no noise or smell. Very beautiful region

title: (46022) València - 4 Avinguda dels Tarongers
description: Parking near the university open from 8-23

title: (46022) València - 4 Avinguda dels Tarongers
description: University parking. Open from 8 a.m. to 11 p.m. We have parked the motorhome to visit the football field and take a ride. Bus stop nearby.

title: (46004) València - 44 Carrera de la Fonteta de Sant Lluís
title_short: (46004) València - 44 Carrera de la Fonteta de Sant Lluís
description: Drinking water fountain, in the small park

address.street: 44 Carrera de la Fonteta de Sant Lluís

title: (46021) València - 7 Carrer del Serpis
description: Public laundry with washing machines of 6 and 12 kg, dryers are also available.

title: (46026) València - 44T Carrer de Bernat Descoll
description: Good parking day/night without being far from the center and without paying

title: (46026) València - 46 Avinguda d'Ausiàs March
description: Laundry service. Fastest was in 38 minutes. Includes coin changer.

title: (46013) València - 4A Calle Nuñez de Balboa
description: Free parking spaces are available large enough quiet place to sleep restaurant and bar nearby if needed no noise at night just 1 garbage truck at 4am, we slept my little tribe and myself with the van

title: (46013) València - 1 Calle Magallanes
description: Public parking with spaces with good depth to park without services. Near City of Arts. We spent two nights without problems.

title: (46128) Port Saplaya - 16 Avenida l'Horta
description: Water Tap located on pathway - Not sure if it’s drinkable. Free parking along and street nice walk around ‘little Venice’

title: (46026) València - 1413 Calle Pai Malilla Norte
description: A super quiet place, and with a 30 minute walk you are in the center, otherwise with a bus, (8) with a few stops. To visit Valencia is great.

title: (46022) València - 56 Camí de Farinós
description: Despite being located in the city, It is among cultivated land and huts, during the day Many Cars go through, if you want to visit the city without having to park beside urbanizations.

title: (46133) Meliana - 39 Avinguda Horta
description: Free parking in front of the sea. No shower or toilet.

title: (46133) Meliana - 95 Partida Masamarda
description: Land parking near the beach. Possibility of shade. Overnight is allowed, the only thing close to the road. Foot washing fountain in the parking lot itself.
